QuestData.Title: His Name Was... Stormstout
QuestData.Description: The land is ripe with rumors of an unusual pandaren monk whose power was matched only for his appetite for brew.$b$bHe was traveling with his young niece who's mouth seems to get them into a lot of trouble.$b$bThe locals say these two were headed to the Valley of the Four Winds. You should meet him! Just... watch out for that right hook.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Chen Stormstout at the Thunderfoot Fields in the Valley of the Four Winds.
